website_summaries.verdict: These roller shades promote privacy while also protecting against 50 percent of light and 100 percent of ultraviolet rays.
pros: The light-filtering roller shade fabric helps to save energy in the house
The fabric blocks light from entering, which helps to keep your home cool
Request custom sizes for a perfect fit, within 1/8 of an inch accuracy
cons: Because of the somewhat complex installation instructions, your measurements must include the space for the mounts and brackets

customer_reviews.title: virtually no instructions for mounting these shades
customer_reviews.text: The large shade box was broken and parts were scattered in the shipping box - the shade has screws in it - you can hear them but they won't fall out. There are NO instructions for installation - so I went online - no ZY Blinds on youtube so I am going to wing it with the bali instructions and hope for the best. it looked to me like the blind needed removed from the casing in order to install so I tried to remove - they won't come apart - so per the video I am going to place the brackets and hope they pop in. NOT what I had in mind at all.
customer_reviews.author: Laura L. Hottman

customer_reviews.title: Works well, easy to install, but could look better
customer_reviews.text: Installation instructions are poor, but it is easy to figure out. The blind up/down mechanism works very well. My real complaint is the lack of something to cover the roll and mounting brackets. It would look much nicer if they they were covered by a piece of faux wood, for example, like the one in one of my pictures from another blind I have.
customer_reviews.author: L. Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Customer Servicd as nd Communication!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 4 blinds for my very large oversized windows. Thus company made sure that the right size was ordered. Originally sent only one to confirm fit and function...perfect! They shipped three more and when hanging, I realized two of the windows were not the same size. This was my error, not theirs. They were just starting Chinese New Years celebration and did advise of delay as factory shuts down during this holiday. I was fine with that and did receive the blinds very quickly considering. Wish i had more windows to cover. The blinds were very easy to install and the quality was even better than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Christine remaly

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother, just get a brand name
customer_reviews.text: Shade came with wrinkles in it. Hopefully they fall out.. also the pull shade stops in 1 inch increments, making it IMPOSSIBLE to sit flush on the sill without causing waves in the material. DO NOT BUY!!
customer_reviews.author: PS

customer_reviews.title: SIMPLE AND EASY TO INSTALL
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS ROLLER SHADE!!! Definitely going to order a few more. It looks clean and simple, fits perfect (mine is outside mount so it doesn't leave any gap). The light gray color is very nice. Rolling mechanism seems to work very well so far. Although it didn't come with a clear installation instruction (pretty much said "mount brackets to wall, attach roller shade to brackets") it was very easy to figure out and to install.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A bit disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a cordless roll shade. I received a cord one. The fabric of the shade is not of the best quality, it wrinckles very easily and permanently after the first use. The recoil system sucks, Ikea one is much better. Manual of instruction is too synthetic with poor quality pictures. Pros? I don’t know. Probably it’s that you can customize it
customer_reviews.author: Nico

customer_reviews.title: Great shade
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit fast accurate fit. Open communication all the way through. Easy self return once started. Love them. That need more color options
customer_reviews.author: idahohuntress

customer_reviews.title: Takes 10 Minutes to Install
customer_reviews.text: The ease of installation was nice, the directions are in Chinese so being able to eyeball installation is important. The system is compact when the shade is fully retracted, I’ll be installing a piece of wood trim to conceal it from view. I ordered the gray color, it’s not completely blackout but I think it’ll do nicely.
customer_reviews.author: D Lance

customer_reviews.title: Best shades I have ever had!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit! No struggle role to open or close! Easy install. The company worked diligently to ensure the shades were properly sized, and checked in to see how they were working months after purchase.
customer_reviews.author: 2RBLE

customer_reviews.title: Really awesome. Will order more.
customer_reviews.text: So they arrived on time. Looked great coming out of the box. Even better installed. Easy to setup. I would just say that instructions need to be clear and more detailed for inside window frame and outside install.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Wildman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect light comes through
customer_reviews.text: If you want natural light in the romo without the glare and heat of the sun, this is the shade to install.
customer_reviews.author: Maria H L

customer_reviews.title: Product as described, good service.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the blind for the sliding door leading to the backyard. I was immediately contacted to confirm dimensions and customize it to my needs. Delivery was prompt and was ready to install. It's been working as expected and have nothing to be dissatisfied with.
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: Great product, slow shipping
customer_reviews.text: Love this shade. It adds a wonderful pop of color to the living room. It does an excellent job of blocking out the sunlight when it’s closed. The downside is that the shipping takes so long!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Addition to my Windows!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these blinds, and am soo happy I did. The money I saved by not going thru Home Depot I can use to get blinds for two other rooms in my home. They were easy to install and look great in my Anderson windows.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product and amazing customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shades and the product is great and very easy to install, what I liked the most was customer service, they call me and text me to get the exact measurements of my window. Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: TOP NOTCH
customer_reviews.text: This is a Superior product, plus the BEST CUSTOMER SERVICE I HAVE EVER EXPERIENCED, on Amazon!! I would, HIGHLY, recommend this product, as well as this company!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good blinds
customer_reviews.text: See blind quality seems very good I can't give it an excellent cuz I don't have a comparison but the quality is very good the service was very good customer service was excellent
customer_reviews.author: Paul N.

customer_reviews.title: Installation n Service
customer_reviews.text: The measuring and contact service was a breeze. Installation was simple easy......no directions....but... you really do not need them...... They look Marvelous!!! And....Cindy is Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rex H Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, good price
customer_reviews.text: my roller shade came as ordered, fit perfectly and was easy to instal. It is great quality and a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Lize

customer_reviews.title: Good experience
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my kitchen window. Love the product, easy installation. Customer service was excellent! Constant communication from the seller from order- delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Get your measurements correctly
customer_reviews.text: Seller was very responsive and made sure of measurements but for sending. Look great roll up great. Love them :)
customer_reviews.author: Julie Naylor

customer_reviews.title: Very supportive vendor!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely satisfied. Vendor was very responsive and they worked extra hard to make sure the shade was proper size.
customer_reviews.author: Juan A Rios

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Seller did a great job and with close follow up. Product works great.
customer_reviews.author: Kayhan Guceli

customer_reviews.title: R.
customer_reviews.text: No instructions really, except a piece of paper with 2 pictures. Had to improvise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Basic Shades
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated ordering but I have two non-standard windows and only option was expensive customs. I received a phone call about a day or so after order and was more uncertain. They arrived and fit my windows perfectly. I would HIGHLY recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Company
customer_reviews.text: I order 5 but had them send me only one to try, unfortunately, it didn't work for me. But Cindy from the company handled my refund with ease. They are made very well much better than say, Lowes.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. T

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to Install, & The assistance in getting the right color & dimensions perfectly is spot on. their Customer Service is great. Thank You, Very happy with my Purchase. I will Keep them in mind for future window shades.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer.
customer_reviews.text: Very good. It works so well. Easy to pull up or down. Smooth and sleek. Happy customer!!
customer_reviews.author: Kay Fritz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect quality blinds.  Darkens room
customer_reviews.text: Just what we wanted for our theater room. Nice and dark. Fit perfect
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look great Easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Measurements are spot on. Good communication with the seller. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Kramer

product_meta.title: ZY Blinds Cordless Roller Shades Light Filtering Custom Made Any Size from 20-78inch Wide UV Protection Enery Saving Window Shades Blinds for Home, Hotel, Club 28" W x 48" L, Royal Blue
product_meta.description:
Size:28" W x 48"L| Color:Royal Blue-cordless-50% BlackoutMOUNT TYPES: 
Inside mounted shades will have a deduction taken of approximately 1/4" to ensure a proper fit inside the window frame.Inside mounted shades require a minimum frame depth of 2.5inch for secure installation. If your window frame depth is less than 2.5inch please select outside mount.Outside mounted shades should be ordered with the exact width of the area you wish to cover. Outside mounts are often used when there is not sufficient frame depth for inside mounting.Our shades come with all mounting hardware, and mounting hardware for both inside mount and outside mount
INSIDE MOUNT MEASUREMENT: 
Step 1.Measure the inside frame width at three locations-the top,middle,and bottom. Record the smallest of the 3 measurements and use that number deduct 1/4inch as your inside width when ordering.
Step 2. Measure the height at 3 locations-the left,middle,and right side. Record the smallest of the 3 measurements and use the number as your inside width when ordering.
OUTSIDE MOUNT MEASUREMENT: 
Step 1. Measure the outside frame width adding 6-10inch to be the outside mount width.
Step 2. Measure the outside frame length adding 5-10inch to be the outside mount length. The overlap it recommended to allow appropriate coverage and avoid any light gaps.
Type: Solid color roller shade.
Feature: Thermal Blackout Waterproof 
Material: Polyester Fabric
Installation: All Mounting Hardware Included.
feature_bullets: DESCRIPTION:Cordless blackout roller shade made out of fabric,no cords for a clean look and child safety. The cord in the bottom bar is removable,which help you pull up and down. No sunlight gets through this shade and it is same color facing the street,block about 50% light,energy saving insulates against heat and cold,noise is reduced and provide privacy.We can custom size to suit your windows,maximum size is 90" wide and 118inch long.We can customize window shades up to an 1/16th inch.

INSIDE MOUNT:Min depth for inside mount is 2.5", shade width is at least 0.25" less than widnow width, shade length is at least 3" longer than window height. Take example, if window inside is 25.5" wide by 36" high, shade width should less than 25.25"(25.5"-0.25), shade length should longer than 39"(36"+3"), choose the closest size 25" W x 40"L then reply us email telling us two information:1) window size 25.5" wide by 36" high. 2)Inside mounting. We will change the size to 25 1/4"W x 39"L.

OUTSIDE MOUNT: Shade width need to be 3-6" wider than window width, shade length need to be 8-10" longer than window length for better coverage. Take example,if window outside is 25.5" wide by 36" high, shade width should more than 28.5"(25.5"+3"), shade length should longer than 44"(36"+8"). Choose the closest size 29" W x 44"L to place order then reply us email telling us two information:1) window size 25.5" wide by 36" long. 2)Outside mounting.

ATTENTION: The width does include the brackets which take up a minimum of 0.6" on each side then you have your roll with the material.So material width will be at least 1.2" smaller total. For an inside mount you will have a tiny gap on each side. Order the closest size and then we will send email within 24 hours to confirm window information,if we do not get any reply in 48 hours, we will make the size without any adjustment.

SHIPPING: WE DO NOT DELIVER TO PO BOX ADDRESSES AND APO ADDRESS,Courier companies do not deliver to PO boxes and APO address because the shades are too long for Post. PROJECT SUCCESS GUARANTEED: When you shop with us,we guarantee your project will be a success. No matter if you made a mistake or there are other issues, you will be covered. Cell Phone:(929)336-2336
